title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is dedicated to nurturing future\\-ready developers through live projects, hands\\-on learning, and structured mentorship programs. The organization focuses on building strong front\\-end and back\\-end development skills aligned with real\\-world industry requirements.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will work across all layers of web development‚Äîfrom creating engaging user interfaces to building robust, scalable backend systems. This role is ideal for candidates seeking end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design and develop full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Integrate APIs and ensure smooth data flow between front\\-end and back\\-end systems

**Requirements** 



* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js

title: Java Backend + Python
description:

 Our client is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that enables enterprises to reimagine business models and accelerate innovation through digital technologies. Powered by more than 84,000 entrepreneurial professionals across more than 30 countries, it caters to over 700 clients with its extensive domain and technology expertise to help drive superior competitive differentiation, customer experiences, and business outcomes.
 



 Job Title: Java Backend \\+ Python
 



 Location: (Pan India)\\-Bangalore (Global village Tech Park) / Hyderabad (Rai Durg) /) / Pune (Shivajinagar)
 



 Experience: 7\\+ Years

-

title: Test Automation Engineer III
description:
At PDI Technologies, we empower some of the world's leading convenience retail and petroleum brands with cutting\\-edge technology solutions that drive growth and operational efficiency.¬†¬†
 




  






 By ‚ÄúConnecting Convenience‚Äù across the globe, we empower businesses to increase productivity, make more informed decisions, and engage faster with customers through loyalty programs, shopper insights, and unmatched real\\-time market intelligence via mobile applications, such as GasBuddy.¬† We‚Äôre a global team committed to excellence, collaboration, and driving real impact. Explore our opportunities and become part of a company that values diversity, integrity, and growth.¬†
 




  





**Role Overview:
 
  





 Do you love building software that thrills your customers? Do you obsess over the quality of your software? Do you insist on the highest standards for the software your team develops? Are you an advocate of measurable quality? Can you dive deep and still maintain the big picture of your solution‚Äôs components and the customer experience? Well, if this is you, then come join an energetic team of engineers building the future of PDI software solutions.
 



 As a Test Automation Engineer (a.k.a. Software Engineer In Test) you will be part of an Agile team and involved in all aspects of our projects‚Äô lifecycle from inception through release working closely with the team‚Äôs product owner, architects and engineers. Your mandate on the team will be to: (a) maximize the quality, measurability and supportability of the production features being developed, (b) maximize the testability of the software by finding and closing gaps in test coverage (c) minimize the team‚Äôs overall internal defect escapes by shifting the balance of how we manage quality from end\\-of\\-cycle defect detection \\& containment (bug\\-finding \\& fix cycles) to up\\-front defect prevention (automation backed coverage of all our application features).
 



 You will not be writing production code. You will however be writing a lot of code in the form of tools, emulators, mocks, fakes, stubs, unit, component and integration tests for mobile apps, web apps and APIs. You will also be working closely with the Engineering DevOps teams helping enhance our integration with our continuous integration (CI) systems, our virtual labs and helping build out fully automated reporting of all the various project quality metrics with a vision of achieving ‚Äúpush\\-button‚Äù reporting of a project‚Äôs software quality and trending (code coverage, static analysis, test surface coverage).
 




  




**Key Responsibilities:** 
* Setting up test environments as required including client and web/mobile applications, services and databases
* Preparing Automation Test Plans for Service Level Tests, Integration Tests and UI tests as needed
* Review product owner acceptance criteria and look for Non\\-Functional Requirement gaps to fill
* Mentor and support other engineering teams on how to write good unit tests, component, integration and E2E tests using best practices and standard frameworks
* Question \\& challenge manual QA by other teams and guide them to eliminate it replacing manual with automation
* Support automating traceability of Stories, Acceptance Criteria and Test cases through the integration of CI and TDD/BDD frameworks and tools
* Be part of an Agile team, participate in all Agile ceremonies \\& activities and be accountable for the sprint deliverable
* Participate in Release/Iteration planning, smoke, feature and regression test planning
* Design \\& build automation smoke, feature \\& regression tests
* Review code with your peers for testability, supportability and look for full unit test coverage
* Write feature use cases in TDD/BDD to drive the creation of automated and/or manual test cases
* Build mocks, emulators, fakes, stubs and test case libraries driving towards 100% acceptance test coverage of stories



  




**Qualifications:** 
* 8 To 9 years of experience in software development and software automation
* Proficient in SQL based RDBMS, DML \\& DDL (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server...)
* Proficient in two or more of: Test NG, Selenium/Appium, or other open\\-source automation tools
* Experience integrating testing results with CI tools: Bitbucket, Jenkins, SonarQube, etc
* Experience with network management, windows application, services, web application and database setup
* Experience with multi\\-tenant architecture, infrastructure security \\& routing
* Experience writing functional and performance tests for Web APIs and Web Applications
* Comfortable working in Mac, Windows and Linux OS and networking including network configuration, scripting, permissions mgmt, using bash, PowerShell
* Highly motivated self\\-starter with a desire to help others and take action
* Requires strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to translate technical concepts into non\\-technical terms
* Ability to independently work as a contributing member in a high\\-paced and focused team
* Ability to multi\\-task and prioritize tasks with competing deadlines
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills with the ability to work under pressure
* Ability to socialize ideas and influence decisions without direct authority
* Collaborative in nature with a strong desire to dig in and learn independently and as well as through asking questions
* Considers ‚Äòbest\\-practice‚Äô standards, as well as departmental policies and procedures
* Experience with one or more mainstream programming languages: Java, Node.JS/JavaScript, Python
* Experience writing functional E2E automation tests
* Strong proficiency in using Jira as a test management tool
* Familiarity with mock testing to isolate components during the testing process
* Extensive knowledge of Postman for API testing and validation
* Solid understanding of JSON data format and its implementation in automated tests
* Strong computer science fundamentals: OOP, design patters, data structures \\& algorithms
* Preferred: Mobile App Testing, domain experience in Fuel and Retail industry



  




**Behavioral Competencies:** 
* Cultivates Innovation
* Decision Quality
* Manages Complexity
* Drives Results
* Business Insight






  




  



 PDI is committed to offering a well\\-rounded benefits program, designed to support and care for you, and your family throughout your life and career.¬† This includes a competitive salary, market\\-competitive benefits, and a quarterly perks program. We¬†encourage a good work\\-life balance with ample time off \\[time away] and, where appropriate, hybrid working arrangements.¬† Employees have access to continuous learning, professional certifications, and leadership development opportunities. Our global culture fosters diversity, inclusion, and values authenticity, trust, curiosity, and diversity of thought, ensuring a supportive environment for all.
 



  


 We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.**

title: QA Automation Engineer (Web & Mobile)
description:
**Infilon Technologies Pvt Ltd** 
 is a prominent software development company located in Ahmedabad, hiring a
 **QA Automation Engineer (Web \\& Mobile)** 
 for one of its clients,
 **TenForce** 
 .
 



  





**TenForce** 
 is an expert in EHSQ and Operational Risk Management software, based in Belgium and part of
 **Elisa IndustrIQ** 
 , helping global enterprises achieve intelligent manufacturing.
 



  





**Job Location:** 
 Ahmedabad, Gujarat (WFO)
 



**Experience:** 
 3\\+ years
 



  





**Your mission as QA Engineer** 



* **Web \\& Mobile testing** 
 across functional, regression, usability \\& compatibility scenarios.
* Design, execute, and maintain
 **manual test cases \\& test plans** 
 .
* Build
 **automation scripts** 
 for regression and E2E flows (UI \\& API).
* You are driven by the following: Are the new functionalities doing what they are supposed to do? Is the software logically sound? Is it user\\-friendly?
* You register and document all issues on our internal tracking system and communicate your important findings directly to the relevant teams so that things can be improved.
* You aim at making test designs that are reusable and can be automated.
* You take ownership on testing activities and give the final Go for a qualitative delivery.
* You are the driving force behind continuous improvement through software testing, implementing improvements as to quality, effectivity and efficiency.



  





**The QA Engineer we are looking for has the following characteristics:** 



* You hold a bachelor/master‚Äôs degree and have at least 3 years of experience in software testing in a cloud environment.
* You have a proven track record in modern QA practices, including end\\-to\\-end automation, continuous integration, and continuous delivery processes.
* You have experience in writing test scripts and automating test designs in collaboration with the development team.
* You are proactive, strong\\-minded, a quick thinker and assertive.
* You remain calm and clear\\-headed under pressure.
* You have an eye for detail.



  





**Who are we looking for?** 




 A QA engineer who enjoys collaborating with his fellow testers, software developers, analysts, and project managers.
 


* Someone who is accurate, result\\-oriented while keeping the customer in mind.
* You actively participate in the QA process, you are hands\\-on.
* You collaborate with our development and release teams to help build a robust CI/CD pipeline for releases.
* You learn new software faster than everyone around you and enjoy teaching others.
* Your sharp eye for detail does not distract you from the big picture and your sound judgement guides you when assessing workloads and feasibility, setting priorities, or weighing the impact of bugs.
* Excellent English communicator



  





**What‚Äôs in it for you?** 



* Opportunity to work
 **autonomously** 
 while being part of a dynamic
 **team** 
 .
* Tackling daily a wide range of
 **challenges** 
 , across multiple customers and
 **continuously** 
 growing and expanding your expertise.
* Eternal
 **respect** 
 from your colleagues as you improve the system.



  





 Join us today and power your potential! Interested Candidates,
 **kindly share your CV at hr@infilon.com** 




  





 www.infilon.com
 



 Ahmedabad, Gujarat

**We are looking for exceptional talent and leadership to join Fast Growing Startup into Scalable Intelligence, the world‚Äôs first company developing Agentic Silicon for powering the future of AI.**

title: Javafullstack Developer
description:
Our client is a global technology company headquartered in Santa Clara, California. it focuses on helping organisations harness the power of data to drive digital transformation, enhance operational efficiency, and achieve sustainability. over 100 years of experience in operational technology (OT) and more than 60 years in IT to unlock the power of data from your business, your people and your machines. We help enterprises store, enrich, activate and monetise their data to improve their customers‚Äô experiences, develop new revenue streams and lower their business costs. Over 80% of the Fortune 100 trust our client for data solutions.
 



 The company‚Äôs consolidated revenues for fiscal 2024 (ended March 31, 2024\\). approximately $57\\.5 billion USD., and the company has approximately 296,000 employees worldwide. It delivers digital solutions utilising Lumada in five sectors, including Mobility, Smart Life, Industry, Energy and IT, to increase our customers‚Äô social, environmental and economic value.
 



  





**Job Title: Java fullstack Developer** 




**Location: Bengaluru** 




**Experience: 8\\+Years** 




**Job Type :** 
 Contract to hire.
 



**Notice Period:** 
 Immediate joiners.
 



**Mandatory Skills: Java,springboot,kotlin,vue.js** 




**Job Description** 
 :Position: Full Stack Engineer \\- System Certification View Service Location: Bangalore, India Experience: 8\\-10 years
 



 Position Overview: We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Engineer to lead the development of the System Certification View Service, a critical component in the MB.OS Portal ecosystem. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in both frontend and backend development,.
 



 Key Responsibilities:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Lead a team of 4 developers in building and maintaining the System Certification View Service.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Architect and implement solutions using Vue.js 3, TypeScript, Spring Boot, Kotlin, and modern web technologies.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality through code reviews, testing strategies, and best practices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Collaborate with backend teams integrating with multiple microservices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Mentor junior and senior developers in modern development practices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Drive technical decisions and establish development standards.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Coordinate with product owners and stakeholders on feature development.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Oversee CI/CD pipeline maintenance and deployment strategies.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Lead the technical design and architecture of the service built on Spring Boot/Kotlin stack.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Guide performance optimization and scalability improvements.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Champion DevOps practices including CI/CD, containerization (Docker), and infrastructure as code.
 



 Required Skills \\& Experience:
 



 ‚Ä¢ 8\\-10 years of software development experience with strong expertise in both frontend and backend development with technologies like Vue and Kotlin.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Expert\\-level knowledge of Vue.js (preferably Vue 3\\), TypeScript, and modern JavaScript.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Deep expertise in Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data JPA, and Spring Cloud.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong experience with state management (Pinia/Vuex), routing, and component architecture.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Proficiency in build tools (Vite, Webpack) and package managers (pnpm, npm).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with testing frameworks (Vitest, Playwright, Jest, JUnit, Mockito, Testcontainers).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of REST API integration and HTTP client libraries.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong experience with PostgreSQL and database optimization.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Proven experience with Apache Kafka and event\\-driven architecture.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Hands\\-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms (preferably Azure).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Understanding of OAuth2/JWT and enterprise security patterns.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with monitoring and observability tools (OpenTelemetry, Datadog preferred).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong leadership and mentoring capabilities.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with enterprise\\-grade applications and scalable architectures.
 



 Preferred Qualifications:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of automotive industry or certification processes.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with AG Grid or similar data grid libraries.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Azure cloud services and infrastructure.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with security scanning tools and DevSecOps practices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with Helm and Kubernetes deployment.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with contract testing (Pact) and load testing (Gatling).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Mercedes\\-Benz development standards and tools.
 



 Soft Skills:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong leadership and mentoring capabilities.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills for stakeholder engagement.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Problem\\-solving mindset with analytical thinking.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Ability to work in agile/scrum environments.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Cross\\-cultural collaboration skills for global teams.
 



 Education:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Relevant certifications in frontend technologies or Azure are a plus

title: Mentor
description:
**Company Description**

 TECHMONKS is an ed\\-tech platform dedicated to providing affordable, accessible, and career\\-oriented tech education for aspiring developers across India. Specializing in Full Stack Web Development and Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT), TECHMONKS offers training in cutting\\-edge tools such as React.js, Flask, MongoDB, Docker, and more. Through mentor\\-led live sessions, hands\\-on projects, and placement\\-focused strategies, the platform equips beginners and career switchers with job\\-ready skills. With a focus on one\\-on\\-one mentorship, project\\-based learning, and comprehensive placement support, TECHMONKS has helped over 1,000 learners transform their careers. Operating primarily out of India, TECHMONKS serves a global audience.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a part\\-time remote Mentor role, where you will provide expert guidance to students in the field of technology, particularly in Full Stack Web Development and IIoT. Your responsibilities include delivering mentor\\-led live sessions, providing one\\-on\\-one student support, reviewing projects, offering constructive feedback, and ensuring a comprehensive learning experience. Mentors will also collaborate with the TECHMONKS team to enhance curriculum quality and assist in technical problem\\-solving for students.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Full Stack Web Development and IIoT, with expertise in tools like React.js, Flask, MongoDB, Docker, and Git
* Experience in mentoring, teaching, or coaching with a focus on individual and group learning support
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to review and provide constructive feedback on technical projects
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively guide and support learners of varying experience levels
* Passion for education and a commitment to helping learners achieve their goals
* Prior industry experience as a software developer or engineer is a plus
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is beneficial
